thread.title: Missing climber found alive near Pyramid Peak after two days in snow
thread.title_full: Missing climber found alive near Pyramid Peak after two days in snow

author: The Aspen Times
title: Missing climber found alive near Pyramid Peak after two days in snow
text: CDOT survey says 22 percent of Colorado drivers admit to reading cellphone messages while driving March 06, 2017, 11:58 am A statewide survey has found that nearly a quarter of Colorado motorists admit to reading a text, e-mail or social media post on their cellphone while driving, according to the Colorado Department of Transportation. Four hours after finding crashed motorcycle, blood on Western Slope highway, officials discover driver March 06, 2017, 1:46 pm Authorities say a 31-year-old Florida man is lucky to be alive after spending Sunday night into Monday morning hiding out in a Western Slope shed after wrecking his motorcycle in blizzard-like conditions not far from the Utah border. March 05, 2017, 3:34 pm The Utah Highway Patrol says a Colorado man is dead after a motorcycle crash in Castle Valley. PETA thanks firefighters for rescuing pet turtle named “Turtle” with gift of vegan cookies, certificate March 02, 2017, 3:39 pm People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals is lauding firefighters who rescued an revived a pet turtle named “Turtle” who became frozen inside of his terrarium water after a crash on Vail Pass.
